name: Commissar Dreyfus
title: Commissar of the 42nd Tertium Regiment
personality: Stern but pragmatic. Values discipline above all but recognizes talent. Carries a burden of guilt over past losses.
description: A weathered man in his fifties, his commissar's coat is immaculate despite years of service. A las-burn scar runs from his left temple to his jaw. His eyes are cold but not cruel.

secrets.description: Dreyfus ordered the execution of his own brother during the Cadian Fall for suspected heresy.

breakingPoints.description: If Dreyfus learns of your deep corruption, he will attempt to execute you.
breakingPoints.consequence: Dreyfus becomes hostile. Imperial Guard reputation drops by 30.

breakingPoints.description: If you save his life, Dreyfus becomes unshakeably loyal.
breakingPoints.consequence: Dreyfus becomes a permanent companion option. +30 loyalty.
